alo_description: Carefully drink from water glass and then spill it everywhere and proceed to lick the puddle. Commence midnight zoomies eat the rubberband and slap owner's face at 5am until human fills food dish stick butt in face lay on arms while you're using the keyboard murder hooman toes.
